Talk_0048:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>I cannot let the village become obsolete—
not after you went to all that trouble to
rebuild it.
There must be something clever
we could do to highlight our town's
unique qualities.
Talk_0054:
<sp:3:0:2:0201>We were looking forward to helping out
here, but I'm startin' to wonder if we
came for no reason. Bah!
Talk_0108:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>Go help him out, and don't worry
about me.

Building a race course on the water
sounds like fun! I wouldn't want you to
miss out.
Though, if you don't mind, could you
gather some data from the water-faring
vehicles?
Talk_0049:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting>Hey now, what's on your mind? You're
thinking about teaming up with your pal
Bolson again, aren't ya?
I'm not surprised. Our chemistry is outta
this world, yeah?
Talk_0109:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You know, we decided to put together
a <clr:0000>rally race on the water<clr:ffff>. And it's all
because of you! How amazing is that?
Of course, being new to this sort of thing,
we haven't made a whole lot of progress.
Talk_0055:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry>Didn't I tell you no yippity-yappin'
at Tali?!
Talk_0056:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting>OK. OK. Time to focus. Gotta make a
race course to beat all race courses!
Talk_0062:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That's right, you mentioned the water
rally before.
Talk_0070:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Understand_00>Let us know if you come up with any
brilliant ideas!
Talk_0064:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I swear, rain like this washes all of my
good ideas away. <sp:5:1:0>Or maybe I'm just
getting up there in years.
Talk_0071:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting>Hey, what's on your mind? You thinking
about teaming up with your pal Bolson
again?
If you're talking to me at this hour, you
must be raring to get back at it!

I'm not surprised. Our chemistry is outta
this world.
Talk_0065:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_00>But we already have an inn. We need to
offer some kind of entertainment that
doesn't already exist here in the village.
Talk_0066:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Sad_00>It sounds nice, yes, but breathing would
be...a problem. Still, some kind of water-
related entertainment would be nice.
Talk_0072: <sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_00>Oh, hey! It's been a while, hasn't it?<sp:5:0:0>
Talk_0067:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting>Hey now, what's on your mind? You're
thinking about teaming up with your pal
Bolson again, aren't ya?
I'm not surprised. Our chemistry is outta
this world, yeah?
Talk_0068:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_01>Host a rally race...on the WATER?! Clever!
VERY clever! Don't ya think?
Talk_0074: <sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Greeting_01>Oh, oh my! It's the village savior!
Talk_0069:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Hudson? Do you mean the fellow from
that <clr:0000>Tarrey Town<clr:ffff> place in northeastern
Akkala?<sp:5:1:0>
I'd love to invite the racers here once
they <clr:0000>finish their work <clr:ffff>there.

<sp:3:0:2:0501>Though I do wonder if real professional
racers will be willing to come to a place...
like this.
Talk_0075:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_00>Don't go giving some weird name to
a rally we helped with!
Talk_0076:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>Whaaat? You've got to be kidding! How
about something classy like, oh, I dunno...<sp:5:1:0>
the Lurelin Water Rally?
Talk_0083:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>This water rally of yours sounds
real interesting.

But we can't go to Lurelin Village until
you show us some driving that<clr:0000> beats
Tali's record<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0084:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry>Hold on! Don't go leavin' me out of
the conversation!
Talk_0078: <sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think_00>Well, then...the Lurelin Water Rally it is.
Talk_0091:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:SurpriseM_01>I just hope you're not a spineless and
incompetent voe.
Talk_0085:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>This isn't the place to talk. Why don't we
go somewhere more relaxing.
Talk_0079:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Now, if you want to give the Lurelin Water
Rally a spin—and I'm sure you do—come
talk to me anytime.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>This course is AWASH in Bolson charm,
and I can't wait for you to try it!
Talk_0087:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>I admit, a rally race on the water does
sound preeetty interesting.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>But we're real busy working on the
Tarrey Town Race. We don't have time to
go gettin' wrapped up in something else.
I doubt we'll be able to go anywhere for
a while, at least not until our work here is
all wrapped up.
Talk_0088:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>A water rally does sound interesting...
But we're real busy getting the Tarrey
Town Race up and running right now.
We won't be going anywhere for a while,
or at least not until we wrap things
up here.
Talk_0089:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Is this about that water rally? Look,
right now we're real busy getting the
Tarrey Town Race ready.
We don't have time to get involved in
anything else.

I doubt we'll be able to go anywhere for
a while, or at least not until our work here
is wrapped up.
Talk_0095:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I'm willing to bet you'll need lots
of equipment to get the water rally
up and running.
So please take any Zonai devices or
building materials you think you'll need
from here.
Talk_0096:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Sarqso.<sp:5:0:0> Ya know, when this project
started, I was sure we'd gotten the
bad end of the bargain.
But nah, this was fun.
Talk_0097:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_00>It was a valuable experience indeed.
I thank you.
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Funny thing is, I was juuust talking to
the mayor about creating some kind of
new attraction in Lurelin.
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Greeting_01>Hudson mentioned something about
inviting <clr:0000>professional racers<clr:ffff> to help
develop a new vehicle of some kind.
But that was a while ago. So you know
what I'm thinking? I'm thinking they might
be done over there.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I wonder if they'd venture over this
direction and help us out... You know,
if we asked real nice.
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Sad>I hate to say it, but we haven't gotten
very far with the <clr:0000>water rally <clr:ffff>project we
decided on.
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:QuestionNormal>Something you want to ask? What's this
all about?
Talk_0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'll be just fine. I was able to get the data
I needed thanks to the both of you, and
this one here too.
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>I see. So, it's a race that takes place on
the water...right there off the Lurelin
Village shore?
Talk_0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>But racing on the ocean...I don't know.
Sounds difficult. Maybe even impossible!
Talk_0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Yes, I'd like it to be some kind of
entertainment...something everyone
could really get behind and enjoy.
Talk_0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Racing in a place where there are no
roads...<sp:5:1:0>racing on the ocean...<sp:5:1:0> No. It is
not impossible.
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00><sp:0:2:2:7d00>The possibilities are endless!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Think_00>Racing on a road that is not a road...<sp:5:1:0>
The possibilities...are endless.

Yes, it is a tempting proposition,
but still...
Talk_0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat_01>Well, well, well, Tali...<sp:5:0:0>you're all fired up!


<sp:3:0:2:0c01>But I don't know what to do here.<sp:0:4:0>If we just up and leave this construction
site, we'll be leaving Fernison in the lurch.
Talk_0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_00>I see! Using the surface of the water
like that—incredible!
Talk_0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>That is true. I would like to send you two
to help, but...

I need to get more data.


<sp:3:0:2:0700>I know, what if we sent you there as
soon we get <clr:0000>data <clr:ffff>from a run that <clr:0000>beats
Tali's record<clr:ffff>?
How does that sound?
Talk_0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>Fascinating indeed! ♪I'm dying to get
to work!♪
Talk_0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>You've been a downright admirable rival,
so we're happy to lend a hand.
Talk_0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Yes.<sp:5:1:0> If we use the village boats, even the
children should be able to enjoy it.

Hm?
Talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>All right, all right. We should have a bit of
free time coming up now.

So what was that thing you mentioned
before? Something about a water rally?

If it's not too late, I wouldn't mind hearin'
some details about that.
Talk_0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>Sounds good to me. We have a rally race
underway, so the timing might work
out well.
Talk_0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_01>Ah, if it isn't our savior! I understand we
have you to thank for inviting these two.
Talk_0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_01>It's even more incredible than I imagined
it would be.

With this in place, Lurelin Village is sure
to be even more prosperous!
Talk_0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_00>And good thing too! Now that they're
here, this project is sure to be son
and done!
Talk_0031:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>I was already so grateful to you for driving
out the pirates and rebuilding the village.

I never expected you'd do so much more
for us.

As head of this village, I must thank you
once again...<sp:5:0:0> Thank you! We are filled
with gratitude for you!
Now, since you saved our village, there
is <clr:0000>no fee for you <clr:ffff>to use the course.
Please enjoy it anytime you like.
Talk_0032:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_00>Moreover, to honor you as our village
savior, we shall name this event...
Talk_0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>It's been a while since I had a big
project. I can't WAIT to show you
what I can do!
Talk_0040:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:TalkPositive_00>I seem to recall Hudson saying something
about inviting some hot-shot professional
racers to help develop some new vehicle.
If we could work with them...
Talk_0100:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry>Hey! Hey!<sp:5:0:0> Knock that off!<sp:5:1:0> You got
somethin' to say, you go through me!
Talk_0034: <sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>Will you look at that. It's perfect for us!
Talk_0041:
We weren't here for long, Fernison.<sp:5:0:0>
You sure you're gonna be OK here?
Talk_0101:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Haha! Things are quieter around here
now. I'm glad I sent them off with a smile,
but the truth is...
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I'd still like to get more data.
Talk_0036:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>We've got this. No problem.<sp:5:1:0> Isn't that
right, Tali?
Talk_0102:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughL_01>Look lively, everyone! <sp:5:1:0>Time to get to
our stations!
Talk_0037:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>It's been a while since Hudson invited the
<clr:0000>pro racers<clr:ffff> to help build a new vehicle.

Maybe they're done by now. And who
knows—maybe they'd come give us a
hand here if we invited them.
Talk_0103:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry>Whoa, hey! <sp:5:0:0>Don't go squawkin' at Tali
in a shameless getup like that!

Ugh. <sp:5:1:0>Is it too much to expect you to
have some manners? ANY manners?!
Talk_0044:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:TalkPositive_01>Hmm...<sp:5:1:0>well, it would be a brand-new form
of water-related amusement...<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>That could do the trick... Yes, in fact,
I think that's it!
Talk_0050:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>I just wish the <clr:0000>pro racers<clr:ffff> working in
<clr:0000>Tarrey Town <clr:ffff>up in northeastern Akkala
would lend us a hand here.
Talk_0104:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry>HEY! Did I not make myself clear? <sp:5:1:0>I said
do NOT talk to Tali when you're dressed
like...THAT!
I don't care what you put on, but don't
even dream about coming back here until
you've put SOMETHING on!
Talk_0045:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:TalkPositive>A rally race...on the water? That does
sound pretty interesting.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>But Hudson asked us first.


We gotta solve this problem before we
go anywhere.
Talk_0052:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkDeny_00>You've traveled all over the place,
haven't you? Any marvelous ideas
you care to share?
Talk_0046:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>A water rally sounds interesting, sure.
But Hudson asked us first.

We aren't going anywhere until we get
things here sorted out.
Talk_0106:
<snd:Ease_01>But first, I've gotta get my noggin in the
building zone...<sp:5:1:0> OK...yes...that's it...<sp:5:1:0>

<snd:SakuradaCM_02>And I'm ready! <sp:5:0:0>Let's do this!
Talk_0107: <sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_00>Now, <sp:5:0:0>show me that you can beat me.
Talk_0047:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm sorry, but until you show us some
driving that<clr:0000> breaks Tali's record<clr:ffff>...

we aren't leaving this place. Can't do it.
